question:
Which among the following persons was/ were members of the Boundary Commission of 1931?
1. HM Mehta
2.TR Phukan
3. SN Banerjee
4. HN Kunjru
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Member of the Boundary Commission of 1931- HM Mehta, TR Phukans. Associate members were Raja of Paralakhamundi (Represented the Odias), SN Sinha (Represented the Biharis) and N Raju (Represented the Telegus).
